[[inst_hl_remu]]
==== HL.REMU

*Syntax:* hl.remu SrcL, SrcR, ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_remu.svg[HL.REMU encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* ALU

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)
